pages.title: Build
pages.text: Place this on top of an Assembly Depot to form the 2-block multiblock. Attach a Warium motor to the blue side for power; the depot itself does not need power. Without a head installed the machine will not expose recipes.

pages.title: Heads
pages.text: Insert one head into the machine block to unlock recipes. Press: ingots -> plates; plates -> bent parts/tubes. Shear: cuts plates/components into wires, gears, and trims. Extruder: draws gears, wires, coils, or wood components. Bore (lathe): hollows barrels/projectiles and bores cast parts.

pages.title: IO + Tips
